meanings.definition: Exceeding the standard or recommended length.
meanings.sent1: The overlengths scarf kept her warm on the chilly day.
meanings.sent2: The tailor had to trim the overlengths pants to fit the customer perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The overlengths jump rope was so long, it reached the moon!
meanings.sent4: Her overlengths hair flowed down her back like a waterfall.
meanings.sent5: The overlengths bridge stretched across the wide river, connecting the two towns.
meanings.sent6: With overlengths sleeves, the sweater looked comically oversized.
meanings.sent7: The overlengths curtains dragged on the floor, creating a dramatic effect in the room.
meanings.sent8: He tripped over the overlengths shoelaces, causing him to stumble.
meanings.sent9: The overlengths garden hose reached all the way to the backyard from the front yard.
meanings.sent10: The overlengths necklace sparkled in the sunlight, drawing everyone's attention.
